    L

    listBooks(List<Book>) - Method in class presentation.MenuDisplay
    Displays a list of books with a simple header and formatting.
    listLoans(String, List<Loan>) - Method in class presentation.MenuDisplay
    Displays a title and a list of loans with core fields.
    listMembers(List<Member>) - Method in class presentation.MenuDisplay
    Displays a list of members with basic details.
    loadAdmins() - Method in class application.AdminFileLoader
    Reads the file and creates Admin objects with username and password.
    loadAdmins() - Method in interface application.AdminSourceLoader
    Loads administrators from a specific source.
    loadAdmins(AdminSourceLoader) - Method in class application.AdminService
    Loads administrators from an external source and registers them in the repository.
    Loan - Class in domain
    Represents a loan transaction between a library member and a book or other media.
    Loan() - Constructor for class domain.Loan
    Default constructor.
    Loan(Media, String, LocalDate) - Constructor for class domain.Loan
    Constructs a loan for a given media and member at a borrow date.
    Loan(String, String, LocalDate, LocalDate) - Constructor for class domain.Loan
    Constructs a loan with explicit identifiers and due date.
    LoanRepository - Class in persistence
    Repository class responsible for managing Loan entities in-memory.
    LoanRepository() - Constructor for class persistence.LoanRepository
    Creates a new LoanRepository instance.
    LoanService - Class in application
    Service responsible for borrowing, returning, and tracking loans.
    LoanService() - Constructor for class application.LoanService
    Creates a service with default rules and repository.
    LoanService(BorrowingRules, LoanRepository) - Constructor for class application.LoanService
    Creates a service with explicit rules and repository.
    LoanService(LoanRepository) - Constructor for class application.LoanService
    Creates a service with a provided repository and default rules.
    login(String, String) - Method in class application.AdminService
    Logs in an administrator by verifying credentials.
    login(String, String) - Method in class application.MemberService
    Attempts to log in a member.
    loginAdmin(String, String) - Method in class application.LoginService
    Attempts to authenticate an admin.
    loginMember(String, String) - Method in class application.LoginService
    Attempts to authenticate a member.
    LoginService - Class in application
    Authentication facade for admins and members.
    LoginService(AdminService, MemberService) - Constructor for class application.LoginService
    Creates a new LoginService which delegates to the provided services.
    logout(String) - Method in class application.AdminService
    Logs out an administrator and updates their status to OFFLINE.
    logout(String) - Method in class application.MemberService
    Logs out a member.
